---
output: 
  pdf_document:
    latex_engine: xelatex
    dev: "pdf"
    keep_md: false
    keep_tex: false
geometry: margin=0.05in
params:
  la_name: "Default LA"
  hb_name: "Default HB"
header-includes:
  - \usepackage{graphicx}
  - \usepackage{fancyvrb}
  - \usepackage{float}
  - \floatplacement{figure}{H}
  - \usepackage{fontspec}
  - \setmainfont{Arial}
  - \setsansfont{Arial}
  - \usepackage{sectsty}
  - \allsectionsfont{\sffamily}
---
\vspace{-9em}
  
```{r fig, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='100%', out.height='100%', fig.pos='t'}
knitr::include_graphics(
  file.path(dir, "output", "PDFs", "2. Main spine charts", 
            paste0(gsub(" ", "_", params$la_name), "_main_chart.pdf"))
)
```
